title: List of all Androidopen source   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidopen source   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: u2020
repoList.description: A sample Android app which showcases advanced usage of Dagger among other open source libraries.

repoList.name: Android-AR-Kit
repoList.description: An open source, Geographical based, Augmented Reality library

repoList.name: PagingLibrary-Sample
repoList.description: An open source app that is refactored to demo Paging Library from Android Jetpack

repoList.name: Smack
repoList.description: A modular and portable open source XMPP client library written in Java for Android and Java (SE) VMs

repoList.name: videochatguru-android
repoList.description: Open source library to create fast and beautiful video chats over WebRTC

repoList.name: AchievementUnlocked-library
repoList.description: [Android] AchievementUnlocked is an open-source Android library that creates "XBOX Achievement Unlocked"-like alerts.

repoList.name: LicensesDialog
repoList.description: LicensesDialog is an open source library to display licenses of third-party libraries in an Android app.

repoList.name: libaums
repoList.description: Open source library to access USB Mass Storage devices on Android without rooting your device

repoList.name: CNNdroid
repoList.description: Open Source Library for GPU-Accelerated Execution of Trained Deep Convolutional Neural Networks on Android

repoList.name: PermissionX
repoList.description: An open source Android library that makes handling runtime permissions extremely easy.
